mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.user_id, e.date, e.genre_id, g.name AS genre_name, e.amount, e.description FROM expenses e JOIN genres g ON e.genre_id = g.id WHERE e.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY e.date DESC

SELECT e.id, e.user_id, e.date, e.genre_id, g.name AS genre_name, e.amount, e.description FROM expenses e JOIN genres g ON e.genre_id = g.id WHERE e.id = #{id} AND e.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY e.date DESC

SELECT e.id, e.user_id, e.date, e.genre_id, g.name AS genre_name, e.amount, e.description FROM expenses e LEFT JOIN genres g ON e.genre_id = g.id WHERE e.user_id = #{userId} AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM e.date) = #{year} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM e.date) = #{month} ORDER BY e.date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expenses (user_id, date, genre_id, amount, description) VALUES (#{userId}, #{date}, #{genreId}, #{amount}, #{description})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM expenses WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
